actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to permit State plans for medical assistance to provide for the provision of laboratory and X-day services under arrangements by States and political subdivisions for the provision of such services.

summary.text: Authorizes the States, in their plans for medical assistance under Title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act, to make arrangement for the purchase of laboratory and x-ray services.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to permit State plans for medical assistance to provide for the provision of laboratory and X-day services under arrangements by States and political subdivisions for the provision of such services.
